root: ^Part of me just wants to know why the Ring Master decided to fire me.
^Well, you couldn't really perform anymore, could you?
^Sure, but he was the one who made me a clown in the first place.
^You can't just make someone a clown then fire them for for being a clown.
^I just keep wondering if it's me. Was I the problem?
^That's what I want to know! It's not like we didn't get along.
^And sure, I was upset when he made me a clown, but I don't blame him. It's not like I could do anything else. He was still giving me a chance.
^But firing me? That's the first time I've actualy been mad at him. And that happened no the day he was murdered.
^It makes me feel sick. Sure I was mad at him, but someone was mad enough to kill him?
^Somehow I feel like a murderer just for being mad at him while he died.
